question: We have read that the writing in the Indus valley Civilization wasÂ Boustrophedon. This means that ______?
option1: It was written left to right
option2: It was written right to left
option3: It was written left to right and right to left in alternate lines
option4: It was written up to down
answer: It was written left to right and right to left in alternate lines
explanation: Boustrophedon is a type of bi-directional text, mostly seen in ancient manuscripts and other inscriptions. Every other line of writing is flipped or reversed, with reversed letters.
